monogr.title: Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017)

body.bibl: Żelazny, Jan Witold. “Primacy of the Church Belongs to the Orient: A Study of Patriarch Timothy’s Letters.” In Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017), edited by Emidio Vergani and Sabino Chialà, 281–90. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 311. Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale, 2022.
